item.title: 一道 Swift Quiz
item.description: 关于 MetaType ，在 Swift 的官方文档中是这样说明的， A metatype type refers to the type of any type, including class types, structure types, enumeration types, and protocol types. The metatype of a class, structure, or enumeration type is the name of that type followed by .Type. The metatype of a protocol type—not
